actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law

official_title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide for equal treatment of father-child relationships as with mother-child relationships in the immigration process.

summary.text: Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to include the relationship between an illegitimate child and its natural father within the definition of "child" for purposes of status, benefit, or privilege under such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide for equal treatment of father-child relationships as with mother-child relationships in the immigration process.
